title: Mobile Robot
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: mobile-robot-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: RB-0002
	- preferred-term:: Mobile Robot
	- status:: complete
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: A mobile robot is a robot with locomotion capabilities that enable it to move within its working environment.
	- source:: [[ISO 8373:2021]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: rb:MobileRobot
	- owl:physicality:: PhysicalEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- belongsToDomain:: [[Robotics]]
	- #### CrossDomainBridges
	  id:: mobile-robot-bridges
	  collapsed:: true
		- dt:uses:: [[Computer Vision]]
		- dt:requires:: [[PathPlanning]]

ontology.definition: A mobile robot is a robot with locomotion capabilities that enable it to move within its working environment.

errors: Missing required property: is-subclass-of (at least one parent class)
